Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to approved courses of study or equivalent on-the-job experience for counselors
Summary: Relates to requiring counselors to have certain courses of study or equivalent on-the-job experience including on providing trauma-informed, patient-centered care, treating co-occurring disorders and sensitivity training.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to approved courses of study or equivalent on-the-job experience for counselors
